# entity

**Instance Property**

The entity description for the fetch index description.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var entity: NSEntityDescription? { get }
```

## Inspecting an Index Description

- **elements**: An array of fetch index element descriptions.
- **name**: The name of the fetch index description.
- **partialIndexPredicate**: A predicate that selects rows for indexing, if the index is a partial index.

items.description: An array of fetch index element descriptions.
